column4: hi everybody, i'd like to know how to repear windows because GRUB destroyed MBR and my PC is tattoed

Hi, what you can do is put your windows cd in and start an install go threw the first part it will install the MBR Also, I believe there is a command called FIXMBR you can use =but you will have to search Google as to how to use it exactly
